ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would recommend this course to other students. I think it should be seen as required for any IR students.

Would absolutely recommend to anyone focusing on IR or PEcannot imagine prepping for the IR exam without having taken this course - provides a much needed foundation in the field especially for IR/conflict students

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course went a long way in deepening my knowledge of IR. Having had very little exposure to IPE in general, this was an incredibly important part of my training.

Very helpful for building a foundation in IPEBeginning to see IPE/security nexus as fascinating research area that I may be interested in focusing personal projects (very unexpected based on my background!)
